name: Get Home (Ayounis35)
description:
Major Modifications:

Scaled enemies and boss, increased movement speed and health

Visual Effects on boss attacks so lasers are more appealing

Set keycard as half of enemies' targets so spawned enemies rush to defend the keycard.

UI Elements and buttons

Added an objective line of text with an anonymous character icon for dialogue. 

Positioned weapons in FOV differently so the reticle and shooting effects please the eye better.
